akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization for appropriation of funds for losses

akn:content.akn:p: § 635l. Authorization for appropriation of funds for losses There are hereby authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of the Treasury without fiscal year limitation $100,000,000 to cover the amount of any losses which are to be borne by the Secretary of the Treasury as provided in section 635k of this title. (Pub. L. 90–390, § 3, July 7, 1968, 82 Stat. 297.)
